device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
devices_included: Tablet; Tabletop, large horizontal display; projector lamp
use_cases_desc:
- City tour planning (exploring a map on the tabletop and seeing details / high res images projected on to points of interest)
- flashligh for mobile exploration of content displayed on tabletop
- 3D viewer using tablets (2D content displayed on tabletop, tablets are 3D viewers)
contribution_desc:
An interactive tabletop that uses IR projections to external devices (tablets, a custom built lamp with a built-in projector) to detect their location in relation to the tabletop. IR cameras detect invisibly projected markers on the tabletop.

The tabletop uses diffused illumination for touch recognition. 

A custom-built desk lamp uses a pico projector and IR camera to project high resolution images onto the tabletop relative to the position it is pointing to.
Handheld tablet devices can augment the view on the tabletop data (e.g. 3D imagery of a city map).
A handheld "flashlight" can be used to project details on the table at a given position.
additional_hardware: IR camers; IR projectors; RGB projectors; IR LEDs for DI
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 3D; Tracking devices only
contribution: Tracking technology; Interaction techniques; Display/Visualization technique
